hero.description: Professional drone spraying services powered by cutting-edge DJI technology. Maximize your crop yield with precision aerial application.
services.title: Professional Drone Solutions
services.description: Leveraging the power of DJI Agras T50 to deliver precise, efficient, and cost-effective agricultural services.
services.spraying.title: Precision Spraying
services.spraying.description: Fast and efficient treatment of large areas with pesticides and herbicides. Precise application ensures maximum effect with minimal consumption.
services.fertilization.title: Crop Fertilization
services.fertilization.description: Even distribution of granular fertilizers and seeds across your entire field. Fast coverage without damaging the soil.
services.mapping.title: Field Mapping
services.mapping.description: Advanced terrain mapping and route planning for optimized coverage of irregularly shaped fields.
services.pest.title: Pest Control
services.pest.description: Rapid response aerial pest treatment to protect your crops before infestations spread.
services.herbicide.title: Herbicide Spraying
services.herbicide.description: Precise herbicide application for weed control without damaging your crops.
services.greenhouse.title: Greenhouse Shading
services.greenhouse.description: Specialized shading application for greenhouses to regulate temperature and light.
features.description: The DJI Agras T50 is the world's leading agricultural drone - reliable, fast, and extremely precise. Proven technology trusted by farmers in over 100 countries.
benefits.title: Advantages of Drone Spraying
benefits.subtitle: Fast, efficient, economical, and safe way to reduce consumption and increase your production.
benefits.speed.desc: 3x faster than tractors and 60x faster than manual labor
benefits.savings.desc: Reduces water and solution consumption, and eliminates crop damage from tractor tracks
benefits.weather.desc: Can operate even after rain when terrain is inaccessible to other machines
benefits.height.desc: Treats plants of any height - from grass to trees and vineyards
benefits.precision.desc: Terrain is evenly sprayed thanks to 3D mapping that the drone receives from satellites via GPS technology
benefits.eco.desc: Reduces environmental pollution through precise, targeted application
benefits.safety.desc: Drones minimize human risk by eliminating the need for direct contact with chemicals and work in hazardous conditions
video.title: Drone Spraying in Action
video.description: Watch how our DJI Agras T50 drone efficiently covers fields with precision spraying technology.
